00029 #include "CalvinCHPFileUpdater.h"
00030 #include "CalvinCHPFileBufferWriter.h"
00031 
00032 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00033 
00034 CHPFileBufferWriter::CHPFileBufferWriter()
00035 {
00036         m_BufferSize = 0;
00037         m_MaxBufferSize = MAX_BUFFER_SIZE;
00038 }
00039 
00040 CHPFileBufferWriter::~CHPFileBufferWriter()
00041 {
00042         FlushBuffer();
00043         Cleanup();
00044 }
00045 
00046 void CHPFileBufferWriter::Cleanup()
00047 {
00048         for (int target=0; target<m_TargetEntryBuffers.size(); target++) 
00049         { 
00050                 m_TargetEntryBuffers[target].erase(m_TargetEntryBuffers[target].begin(), m_TargetEntryBuffers[target].end());
00051         }
00052         m_TargetEntryBuffers.erase(m_TargetEntryBuffers.begin(), m_TargetEntryBuffers.end());
00053 }
00054 
00055 void CHPFileBufferWriter::Initialize(std::vector<std::string> *CHPFileNames)
00056 {
00057         m_CHPFileNames = CHPFileNames;
00058         Cleanup();
00059         for (int i=0; i<m_CHPFileNames->size(); i++)
00060         {
00061                 std::vector<GenotypeBufferEntry> entryBuffer;
00062                 m_TargetEntryBuffers.push_back(entryBuffer);
00063                 m_TargetEntryRowIndexes.push_back(0);
00064         }       
00065         m_BufferSize = 0;
00066 }
00067 
00068 void CHPFileBufferWriter::WriteGenotypeEntry(int target, CHPGenotypeEntry &entry)
00069 {
00070         GenotypeBufferEntry bufferEntry;
00071         bufferEntry.call = entry.GetCall();
00072         bufferEntry.confidence = entry.GetConfidence();
00073         bufferEntry.RAS1 = entry.GetRAS1();
00074         bufferEntry.RAS2 = entry.GetRAS2();
00075         bufferEntry.aaCall = entry.GetAACall();
00076         bufferEntry.abCall = entry.GetABCall();
00077         bufferEntry.bbCall = entry.GetBBCall();
00078         bufferEntry.noCall = entry.GetNoCall();
00079         m_TargetEntryBuffers[target].push_back(bufferEntry);
00080         m_BufferSize += sizeof(GenotypeBufferEntry);
00081         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00082         {
00083                 FlushBuffer();
00084         }
00085 }
00086 
00087 void CHPFileBufferWriter::FlushBuffer()
00088 {
00089         if (m_BufferSize > 0) {
00090                 for (int target=0; target<m_CHPFileNames->size(); target++)
00091                 {
00092                         CalvinCHPFileUpdater updater;
00093                         updater.OpenCHPFile((*m_CHPFileNames)[target].c_str());
00094                         updater.UpdateGenotypeEntryBuffer(m_TargetEntryRowIndexes[target], m_TargetEntryBuffers[target]);
00095                         updater.CloseCHPFile();
00096                         m_TargetEntryRowIndexes[target] += m_TargetEntryBuffers[target].size();
00097                         m_TargetEntryBuffers[target].clear();
00098                 }
00099         }
00100         m_BufferSize = 0;
00101 }
